description: ParaDrop host configuration - Wi-Fi device section
Defines a physical Wi-Fi device and its configuration.

hwmode.description: Basic operating mode (11b for old hardware, 11g for 2.4 GHz, 11a for 5 GHz).

id.description: Physical identifier, e.g. pci-wifi-1 or usb-wifi-0.

rx_stbc.description: Indicates support for receiving frames using STBC.

short_gi_20.description: Enable short guard interval (higher data rates) in 20 MHz channels, must be supported by device.

short_gi_40.description: Enable short guard interval (higher data rates) in 40 MHz channel, must be supported by device.

short_gi_80.description: Enable short guard interval (higher data rates) in 80 MHz channel, must be supported by device.

tx_stbc.description: Indicates support for transmitting frames using STBC.
